field.comment: A structural code to log for this type of exception
field.name: code

field.comment: A message to describe this error
field.name: message

field.comment: Regexes used to identify the exceptions based on the stacktrace
field.name: regexes

field.comment: Amount of ms before we try again. The amount of intervals will determine the amount of times we try.
field.name: retryIntervals

field.comment: You may want to set some errors to failed immediately, use this to do that
field.name: fail
